attributes.action: Public Interest Lawyers - Public Inquiry needed
attributes.additional_details: A full investigation into the actions of the law firm Public Interest Lawyers surrounding their creation and continuation of malacious and false allegations of torture and murder involving HM Armed Forces in Iraq in light of the recent report exonerationg the Army and denouncing all the allegations of murder as pure fantasy. Who propogated and pursued these allegations from armed insurgents who were caught attemtping to kill British soldiers that cost the UK taxpayers over £31 million?
